meanings.definition: Perissodactyls: mammals with an odd number of toes on each foot, such as horses and rhinoceroses.
meanings.sent1: Horses and rhinoceroses are examples of perissodactyls.
meanings.sent2: I learned about perissodactyls in my science class.
meanings.sent3: The zookeeper joked that the perissodactyls were picky about their hoof care.
meanings.sent4: In the ancient world, perissodactyls were symbols of strength and grace.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the size of the perissodactyls at the wildlife sanctuary.
